results.content: One of the best courses I've ever taken on Udemy. Jonas is incredibly knowledgeable in JavaScript and every minute of this course taught me something new. Glad I chose this course and looking forward to enrolling in more of Jonas' courses!
results.content_html: One of the best courses I've ever taken on Udemy. Jonas is incredibly knowledgeable in JavaScript and every minute of this course taught me something new. Glad I chose this course and looking forward to enrolling in more of Jonas' courses!

results.content: Jonas explanation is easy to understand for a layman also. Thanks a ton Jonas
results.content_html: Jonas explanation is easy to understand for a layman also. Thanks a ton Jonas

results.content: A great course, It has taken me 6 months to complete with a full time job in tow. Just about every critical JS topic has been covered at length and it's now my turn to practice on my own and hone my skills. Jonas' teaching was superb, easy to follow and quite professional. My only gripe; I felt the last two chapters were not as fluid as all the previous ones, doable, but not as easy to follow. All in all, amazing

results.content:
Great teacher, and great course. All questions are answered.
It's amazing how you can get so much for so little.
results.content_html:

results.content: This course was a real journey! It combines a perfect mix of theory, history, fundamentals, and practical application. I will have to review it soon because the amount of content is both exhaustive and exhausting. It took me about 3 months to complete the entire thing because I tried to code as much as possible on my own, pausing the videos often and trying to anticipate how Jonas was going to implement his project ideas. I succeeded a lot, failed a lot, wrecked my brain a lot, but I've learned a lot. Thank you for an outstanding experience, Jonas. Node.js, you're next!

results.content: Jonas is really amazing at explaining the most basic to complex concepts of Javascript. He gives examples and teaches the lessons from examples of his experience of web development, which is really helpful. I feel like I am getting the most up to date and relevant topics of Javascript

results.content:
There is a lot of information in this course but it is incredibly boring, truly a mind numbing experience. Most of this course, literally hours on hours, is spent on 13-20min lectures that just include very isolated and basic examples for the topic being explained.

It is by far the worst way to learn. Max believes otherwise but sorry this is incredibly boring. There are two projects in the course but that's really it, and you more or less just follow along rather than get challenged every step of the way. 

I do not recommend this course for beginners. Instead, pick up a project based approach and that will definitely keep you engaged.

results.content: If you want to learn JavaScript, this is the course for you. It not only gives you a deeper knowledge about the language but confidence after completing the course. Highly recommended!

results.content: Fantastic, in-depth course. All Jonas' courses are well worth the time and effort, highly recommended for learning modern javascript.

results.content:
Overall great course. I am completely new to coding and this is definitely giving me a good basis. Having said that I felt like due to the sheer size of the whole language the examples and explanations to each topic were just shown once briefly and then you are expected to memorize it just like that before moving on. 
So a good course but you must look up and practice by your own in order to really learn everything. Still 5 Stars
